features: STOP HURTING YOUR BACK: JEHONN Garage broom can be extended to 55 inches, so you can stand upright for comfortable sweeping instead of bending over. Besides, it also works on wall, ceiling, shelves and lofts. This heavy duty broom greatly protects your back and waist from pain.

THICKEN 4-LAYER BRISTLE: This big broom is 14.5 inches wide, which sweeps wider surface at once. And 4 layers durable bristles gives the kitchen broom the power to collect dust, dirt, hair, rubbish and small debris effectively on tile, marble, ceramics, linoleum and wood floor.

COMFORTABLE EVA GRIP: This collapsible broom features with a EVA padded handle, which is easy to hold even when it gets wet. And it’s easy to store anywhere without occupying space with the large hanging hole.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL HOUSE BROOM: This tall angled broom is a great household cleaning tool for restaurant, yard, kitchen, shop, warehouse, garages, decks, tent, sidewalks, patios, driveways, workshops, basement, lobby, mall, market.

EXCELENT AFTER-SALE SERVICE: JEHONN Outside broom needs to be easily assembled by yourself. If you have any concerns about the use of this floor broom, please contact us through our storefront page "Ask a Question".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great broom. We have cats and dogs and this gets lots of use. It's comfortable to hold and the pole is a great length (and adjustable)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like adjustable height, works well, and good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the opportunity to test the JEHONN Outdoor Broom Heavy Duty with a 55-inch Long Handle, and I was very impressed with its performance. It is a high-quality broom that is effective at sweeping both indoors and outdoors.The JEHONN broom has a long, extendable handle that can be adjusted which makes it easy to sweep without having to bend over. The broom also has a wide, angled head with four layers of bristles. This design allows the broom to sweep up a variety of debris, including dust, dirt, hair, and even small twigs and rocks.I have been using the JEHONN broom extensively since I first received it in September.I have used it to sweep my porch, patio, and outdoor siding. I have also used it indoors to sweep my kitchen and floors. The broom has performed well in all of these applications. It is easy to assemble, it is very strong, and the price is excellent.I just used it yesterday to sweep snow off of my car.I recommend the JEHONN Outdoor Broom Heavy Duty with 55-inch Long Handle to anyone looking for a high-quality, versatile broom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wide-Sweep Broom For The Patio And Garage
reviews.reviewText: I got this broom to help me keep my garage swept out. The angle of the bristles makes it easier to get all the dirt and leaves that blow in. The head is nearly 15-inches wide which means less strokes required.As with many such things these days, the handle comes in threaded sections (which no doubt makes it easier to ship). Once assembled, I don’t want to take it apart again and don’t enjoy the threads coming loose a little as I sweep, so during the original assembly, I put a drop or two of silicone glue onto the threads. Permanent fix.This is a practical, useful broom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars meh, standard size broom
reviews.reviewText: I thought that, will all sections assembled, it would be _longer_ than a standard size, but it doesn't. So, the adjustment (removable sections) is to make it shorter. That can definitely be useful in tight spaces where long handles get in the way or better angles are needed (I am short, with a disability, so use a broom to clean shower walls and tub, for example). In hindsight, it's probably better than what I thought it would be, and I needed a new broom regardless of what I was expecting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Kitchen Broom
reviews.reviewText: This broom was super easy to put together and is a good height. After putting it together, I tried it on my floor and Im really happy with it, on my previous broom, the bristles are pretty course and miss some dirt/dust, but this broom is awesome, the bristles kind of bend to capture everything!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After I assembled, I had issues with it twisting/coming loose while I was sweeping. It’s not one solid piece.It wasn’t awful, but after each room I’d have to tighten a spot. Annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two Cats. Three Litter Boxes. A Clean Sweep!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a dedicated broom for sweeping up the floor in the basement around the litter boxes - sometimes the kitties are a bit vigorous when digging around. This broom has slightly stiffer and denser bristles (whether by virtue of being 'heavy duty' or just newer) than our normal kitchen broom, so is very effective for getting the litter out of crevices and corners, litter dust out of rough spots in the cement, etc. Litter has always seemed to require several sweeps over the same spot to get it all (and the kitties can sure track it around); this one gets it all swept up in fewer.The broom comes in several sections which screw together. Assembly was easy and took less than 5 minutes, including unpackaging. The first time I used it some of the sections came loose as I was sweeping, but it turns out I just hadn't tightened them sufficiently. A good hard twist or two and they've remained tight and secure (with no need to retighten) in the few weeks since.I originally thought I would adjust the height (remove a section) when it was my youngest's turn for 'kitty litter duty'. But it's light and maneuverable even at full size so it's worked great from the teenagers to the 10 year-old. The soft, grippy padding on the handle and at the top are nice touches, and the hanging ring keeps it close by, but out of the way.It doesn't do the sweeping for you, nor remind your teenagers to get to it when it's their turn, but otherwise makes it as pleasant as possible.
